answers.answer: Methadone poisoning? sounds like your allergic, really seriously go and speak to your doc about it, i took methadone for some years and high doses and didn't experience problems like that.Try and focus on more positive things in life family, friends, enjoyable activities, you only get one short at this life and even though we may mess it up time to time try and stay happy!

Thank you so very much for answering.I continue to have these epidsodes in my life. Up four hours, sleep four hours. I went back on my meth really low doses at a time. However,I had an episode at the shrink/case managers officers. I must have been up four hours. I couldn't see, couldn't walk. I had to be taken home. Here's the thing. The MD keep asking me about diabetes. I don't have family, so I don't know. Went home to my trusty computer. I may have a type of Protein-Energy Undernutrition or PEU.Now I know this doesn't seem to have anything to do with our community,but if you would rather ear junk food then a real meal because real meals make you sleepy and sugar doesn't this may effect or be useful to someone.Thank you for being so kind. The thought of giving up what gets me out of bed everyday is beyond depressing. love,love,love

I agree with Atlast.  You're having a bad allergic reaction & your body is rejecting the Meth.  You need to get it through your MDs head or find another.  I had a bad allergic reaction to Naloxone that is in Suboxone.  Of course no believed it until my face and tongue swelled up.............
yes i agree with allergic reaction!!!

question: I recently experienced methadone poisoning. Took days to fiqure out what was going on-not sure why I'm not dead. I'm home taking care of myself, afraid of withdrawal. I take a taste everyday and everyday I get poison symptoms, less each time,but symptoms. I know I should be glad to be alive but I've never been too happy about that. How much longer for the poison symptoms? Beleive it or not Methadone is an upper for me, even after 8 years.
title: Methadone poisoning
